extendedInfo.description: Do you see yourself as a pimp and hustler? Do you have the courage to slap a ho when she gets outta line? Do you have the game to keep your hos bringing in that money? Do you have that drive to get to the top? If you think you can handle that, then this is where you need to be!Pimp Hand is a massive, online, multi-player text based, rpg game. Here you are a pimp on a mission for money, power and respect. You will need to learn how to keep your crew and hos happy while teaching them to knock down the competition.This game throws you deep in to the dark underworld of the streets. A place full of sex, drugs, violence and turf wars. You start out a wannabe pimp, a mini hustler managing at best dropping off tricks for another pimp struggling to make a dollar, you will soon rise up the ranks and prove who is the true hustler in a world full of haters.You can travel to many locations, starting in The Hood up to taking your pimping skills international. Each city boasts new weapons, armor, stat boosters or narcotics. Level means everything in this world. Get your level up, travel farther, make more dough and get your hands on the best items this game has to offer.If money makes the world go round, imagine just how important it must be to a pimp. Money equals power, the more you have, the more you are respected, the more you can spend, the more you can save, the better protection you have and the better property you can own. There are hundreds of ways to make money, you just have to be smart and creative. Make sure to keep the money you earn safe and locked away. There are broke pimps waiting around every corner for you to slip up and jack you for your loot. Bank that paper, save that cash and not draw to much attention on yourself. Grab that interest, but remember for every penny you earn, there's a hundred different ways to spend it and even more wanna be pimps waiting to steal it.You can't be a pimp and hustler without any cash. The in-game crimes section, there is your chance to make some quick easy money. Not only does committing crimes give you money, it'll gain you EXP for successful attempts. Watch yourself though, all crimes are just that. Crimes. Every pimp knows that the cops can be waiting around the corner and are just waiting for you to slip up. If you get caught up you'll be spending some time in the clink. The better property you have, the more will you have adding to the successful completion of crimes. The higher your level? The more crimes you can commit, making you more money. If you do get caught up though, don't fret about catching a case. If you have jail keys, there's your freedom or there are always other corrupt players waiting to bust you out. Time is ticking, money is calling, and the ho's are waiting, What's a playa to do??? Growing fast and getting better by the day.... Make Pimp-Hand.com your new home. Is your macking up to par? If you think your a player, why not become a pimp? Can you make your hos give their last buck? Can you lay down the pimp hand when it is called for? The streets are tough and not made for wimps, crybabies get nowhere out here! Join Pimp-Hand today; Some say pimpin aint easy!! Others say there is nothing to it! I say find out for yourself.. This is the place where you can walk and talk like a pimp. Show the world what you are made of, as you move up through the ranks and become a force to be reckoned with. There will be many ups and downs along your journey. Always fun, always exotic, always pimp friendly, and always a free to play RPG Join Pimp-Hand.com today!
